text: Jardin botanique de Mont Cenis The Jardin botanique de Mont Cenis is an alpine botanical garden located on Mont Cenis above the town of Lanslebourg-Mont- Cenis, Savoie, Rhône-Alpes, France. The garden was created in 1976 at an altitude of about 2000 meters above sea level, and now contains about 800 plants. == See also == * List of botanical gardens in France == References == * Jardin botanique de Mont Cenis * 123 Savoie entry (French) Mont Cenis, Jardin botanique de Mont Cenis, Jardin botanique de Category:Protected areas established in 1976 Category:1976 establishments in France
title: Jardin botanique de Mont Cenis
